sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_3b088c1d47001110a06c690cd36d435b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Déclaration Perte / Vol">7246284947001110a06c690cd36d4389</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>remove operator</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {

    g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "operator");
    
	g_form.setReadOnly("articles_perdus_passe", true);

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-11 13:45:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3b088c1d47001110a06c690cd36d435b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>37</sys_mod_count><sys_name>remove operator</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_3b088c1d47001110a06c690cd36d435b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-20 02:29:47</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_19a340c847d09110a06c690cd36d43c5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.StolenItemsControl</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>StolenItemsControl</name><script><![CDATA[var StolenItemsControl = Class.create();
StolenItemsControl.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    
	getCmdbCis: function() { 

        var req_for = this.getParameter('requested_for');

        var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci');

        gr.addEncodedQuery("assigned_to!=^assigned_to=" + req_for + "^install_status=8");

        gr.query();

        var answer = "";

        while (gr.next()) {
            answer += gr.sys_id + ",";
        }

        return answer;
    },
    type: 'StolenItemsControl'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-20 02:26:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>19a340c847d09110a06c690cd36d43c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>StolenItemsControl</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_19a340c847d09110a06c690cd36d43c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-20 02:29:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_5feb737747c09110a06c690cd36d4323
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Déclaration Perte / Vol">7246284947001110a06c690cd36d4389</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:01ea4ee547320110a06c690cd36d4341</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set stolen items values</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   var ga = new GlideAjax('StolenItemsControl');

    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCmdbCis');

    ga.addParam('requested_for', newValue);

    ga.getXML(callback);

}

function callback(response) {
	
    var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

    g_form.setValue("articles_perdus_passe", answer);

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-20 01:54:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5feb737747c09110a06c690cd36d4323</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set stolen items values</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5feb737747c09110a06c690cd36d4323</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-20 02:29:01</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
